query.myquery: select MEMBER.memberEmail, MEMBER.memberName, MEMBER.memberBirth, MEMBER.memberHobby, MEMBER.memberAdd, MEMBER.memberJob, MEMBER.memberHeight, PROFIL.profilThumbnail from PROFIL inner join MEMBER where MEMBER.memberNo = PROFIL.memberNo and PROFIL.memberNo = ?
select profilThumbnail FROM PROFIL WHERE memberNo=?
INSERT INTO PROFIL(profilNo, memberNo, profilOriginalFileName, profilSaveFileName, profilThumbnail) VALUES(0, ?, ?, ? , ?, 1)
INSERT INTO PROFIL(profilNo, memberNo, profilOriginalFileName, profilSaveFileName, profilThumbnail) VALUES(0, ?, ?, ? , ?, 0)
